channel.title: Dolls on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dolls on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lilly Wachowski-Produced Trans Identity Film ‘Dolls,’ by Geena Rocero, Unveils Trailer (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Geena Rocero is making her mark behind the camera. The four-time Emmy-nominated director’s scripted directorial debut, sci-fi short “Dolls,” has dropped its first trailer ahead of it
